channel.title: Projects on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Projects
item.description: In the second half of the course you’ll work on an operating systems project of your choice in teams of two or three. The goal is to have fun and explore more advanced O / S topics; you don’t have to do novel research. We’ll grade you on how much you got working, how elegant your design is, how well you can explain it, and how interesting and creative your solution is.
